review: The fire stick is great when it works.  I do NOT want to plug the unit into my TV.  I have a small home theater with 7.1 surround sound.  When I plug the Fire Stick into my TV and take an optical cable back to my audio/video receiver, I only get stereo sound.  When I plug it into one of the HDMI inputs in my A/V receiver, I get Dolby Digital 5.1 surround.  The problem is that when I turn on my system, and use the Fire Stick remote control to access the Fire Stick, it either takes a LONG time to come on OR, the audio comes on but no picture until I turn it off and then on again.  Then It might work.  When it works it is great.  Once I get a picture and sound, I can navigate to what ever I want and watch it.
